en: I waited patiently for Jehovah; And he inclined unto me, and heard my cry.
hmr: LALPA chu ka nghâk fan fan a, Chuongchun, ama chu ka kuom tieng a hung thleh a, Ka ko chu a ngai tah a.

en: He brought me up also out of a horrible pit, out of the miry clay; And he set my feet upon a rock, and established my goings.
hmr: Bohmangna khura inthawkin, chirhak inhnâktaka inthawk chun a mi khai suok tah a: Chun, ka ke chu lungpui chungah ân nghat a, ka ke pênhai chu a sukdet a.

en: And he hath put a new song in my mouth, even praise unto our God: Many shall see it, and fear, And shall trust in Jehovah.
hmr: Hla thar ka bauah a sie ta bawk a, ei Pathien inpâkna chu: Mi tamtakin chuong chu hmûng an ta, ṭî bawk an ta; LALPA chu ring tâng an tih.

en: Blessed is the man that maketh Jehovah his trust, And respecteth not the proud, nor such as turn aside to lies.
hmr: LALPA chu a ringsana nei a, Chapohai le khêl tienga pêthai ngaisaklo mi chu, a hamṭha ie;

en: Many, O Jehovah my God, are the wonderful works which thou hast done, And thy thoughts which are to us-ward: They cannot be set in order unto thee; If I would declare and speak of them, They are more than can be numbered.
hmr: Aw LALPA ka Pathien, nangin thilmak i thawhai le, Keini tieng i ngaituonahai hi a tam bêk bêk a, Chuong chu i hmaa suklang sêng ruol a ni nawh a, Inhriettirin hril ding ni lang, Ṭiemsêng ruol ni naw ni.

en: Sacrifice and offering thou hast no delight in; Mine ears hast thou opened: Burnt-offering and sin-offering hast thou not required.
hmr: Inthâwina le thilinhlân chunga hin lâwmna hrim i nei nawh a: Ka nahai hi i mi sukvarpêk tah a; Pumrawhmanga thilinhlân le suol ta dinga thilinhlân chu i phût nawh.

en: Then said I, Lo, I am come; In the roll of the book it is written of me:
hmr: Chu phingle chun keiin, “Ngai ta, ka hung ie, Lekhabu ziela chun ka thu ziek a nih:

en: I delight to do thy will, O my God; Yea, thy law is within my heart.
hmr: Aw ka Pathien, i dit zâwng thaw hi ka lâwm zâwng tak a nih: Anih, i dân thu chu ka lungril- ah a um zing ie,” ka ta.

en: I have proclaimed glad tidings of righteousness in the great assembly; Lo, I will not refrain my lips, O Jehovah, thou knowest.
hmr: Inkhâwmna ropuitaka chun felna chanchin ṭha ka khêkpui a, Aw LALPA, ngai ta, Ka bau hi inro naw ning ti i hriet deh.

en: I have not hid thy righteousness within my heart; I have declared thy faithfulness and thy salvation; I have not concealed thy lovingkindness and thy truth from the great assembly.
hmr: I felna chu ka lungril sûngah ka ip nawh a; I ringumna le i sandamna thu chu ka khêkpui lem a, I ngilneina le i takna chu inkhâwmpui ropuitaka mi- hai kuoma chun ka thup nawh a.

en: Withhold not thou thy tender mercies from me, O Jehovah; Let thy lovingkindness and thy truth continually preserve me.
hmr: Aw LALPA, i lainatnahai chu ka kuomah inro naw la, I ngilneina le i takna chun mi humhim rawp raw se.

en: For innumerable evils have compassed me about; Mine iniquities have overtaken me, so that I am not able to look up; They are more than the hairs of my head; And my heart hath failed me.
hmr: Thil ṭha naw tiem sêng lo chun an mîn huolvêl sih a, Ka rîtlonahai chun an mi hnawt phâk a; Chuongchun, ka dâk thei ta nawh a; Chuong chu, ka samzaihai nêk hin a tam lem a, ka lungril hi a châu tah a.

en: Be pleased, O Jehovah, to deliver me: Make haste to help me, O Jehovah.
hmr: Aw LALPA, lunginsiettakin mi sanhim la, Aw LALPA, mi ṭhangpui dingin inhmaw rawh.

en: Let them be put to shame and confounded together That seek after my soul to destroy it: Let them be turned backward and brought to dishonor That delight in my hurt.
hmr: Ka hringna sukbo tuma zawngtuhai chu, Muolphotak le inzaktakin um tâwl hai sienla, Ka sietna chunga lâwmhai chu, Innghatkîrtirin sukzakin um raw hai se.

en: Let them be desolate by reason of their shame That say unto me, Aha, aha.
hmr: “Chei! Chei!” mi tituhai chu, An muolpho leiin lunginzîng- takin um raw hai se.

en: Let all those that seek thee rejoice and be glad in thee: Let such as love thy salvation say continually, Jehovah be magnified.
hmr: A zawngtuhai po po che chu nangmaa chun hlimtak le lâwmtakin um hai sienla, I sandamna ngainatuhai chun, “LALPA chu chawimawiin um raw se,” ti rawp raw se.

en: But I am poor and needy; Yet the Lord thinketh upon me: Thou art my help and my deliverer; Make no tarrying, O my God.
hmr: Kei chu rimsi le pasetak ka nih, Nisienlakhawm, LALPAIN a mi ngaituo hlak. Nang chu a mi ṭhangpuitu le a mi sandamtu i na; Aw ka Pathien, sâwt riel lul naw raw khai.
